name: Pet Shop Stop
description:
Pet! Shop! Stop! An quality-wise undenieably tragic pet shop simulator.

Welcome to the Haylillyillya national nature reserve! We've got some cool trees, some cool customers, and a really cool little pet shop near our train station!

Play as a cool employee working at Gracia's Pet & Grocery store and enjoy the following;

Feed pet

Talk to customer



Talk to co-worker

That's all!

Made for the Ms. Paint Jam and drawn in Asperite <3

Note; For headphone users the sound effects may be too loud at times, and the main character is an asshole who does bad things,, but he's a lighthearted asshole, so... not really.  Bank robbery? Bank robbery.
